attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Extend the free prescriptions to cover Transplant patients who need drugs to keep them alive, or any other patients who need drugs to sustain life.

rejection.details: Please change the main sentence from "Paul & Pamela Maiden" to an action for HM Governemnt.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
